db_properties.script: SELECT starttime AS order_date, s.id AS order_id, c.id AS customer_id, c.user_id AS email_address, SUBSTR(r.parent_contentnode_id, 9) AS product_id, ol.quantity, ol.price FROM (SELECT s.id s, sa.id sa, di.starttime FROM cust.sale s, cust.salesaction sa, cust.deliveryinfo di WHERE s.type='REG' AND s.cromod_date = sa.action_date AND sa.action_type IN ('CRO','MOD') AND sa.sale_id = s.id AND sa.requested_date > (sysdate - ?) AND s.customer_id = sa.customer_id AND sa.id = di.salesaction_id) t, cust.sale s, cust.salesaction sa, cust.orderline ol, cust.customer c, cms.relationship r WHERE s.id=sa.sale_id AND sa.id=ol.salesaction_id AND NVL(ol.promotion_type,0)<> 3 AND NVL(ol.delivery_grp, 0) = 0 AND s.id = t.s AND sa.id = t.sa AND c.id = s.customer_id AND r.parent_contentnode_id LIKE 'Product:%' AND r.child_contentnode_id = CONCAT('Sku:',ol.sku_code)
